events.name: Los Angeles Chargers at Cincinnati Bengals

lastPlay.text: (14:28) A.Ekeler left end to LAC 34 for 6 yards (G.Pratt).

events.name: Tampa Bay Buccaneers at New Orleans Saints

headlines.description: Russell Wilson was cooking right from the start, throwing four touchdown passes to lead the Seattle Seahawks to a 38-25 victory over the Atlanta Falcons in the season opener Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Wilson throws 4 TD passes, Seahawks beat Falcons 38-25

video.headline: Wilson powers Seahawks to victory with four TDs

tracking.trackingName: *UNPUB 9/15* COM_NFL Highlight (Wilson powers Seahawks to victory with four TDs) 2020/9/13 ESHEET

events.name: New York Jets at Buffalo Bills

headlines.description: Josh Allen led three consecutive first-half touchdown drives, and the Buffalo Bills overcame their own sloppiness and injuries to two starting linebackers in a 27-17 season-opening win over the New York Jets on Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Allen tops 300 yards passing in Bills' 27-17 win over Jets

video.headline: Allen accounts for three TDs in Bills' win

tracking.trackingName: *UNPUB 9/15* COM_NFL Highlight (Allen accounts for three TDs in Bills’ win) 2020/9/13 ESHEET SOTFULL

headlines.description: Mitchell Trubisky perfectly lofted a 27-yard go-ahead touchdown pass to Anthony Miller with 1:54 remaining and the Chicago Bears held on to beat the Detroit Lions 27-23 Sunday.
headlines.shortLinkText: Trubisky throws 3 TDs in 4th to help Bears beat Lions 27-23

video.headline: Trubisky's 3 TDs lead Bears to comeback win

tracking.trackingName: *UNPUB 09/15* COM_NFL Highlight (Trubisky’s 3 TDs lead Bears to comeback win) 2020/09/13 ESHEET SOTFULL

events.name: Green Bay Packers at Minnesota Vikings

headlines.description: Aaron Rodgers took full advantage of the young cornerbacks and the empty stadium in Minnesota, beginning his 13th season as Green Bay's starting quarterback by passing for 364 yards and four touchdowns to lead the Packers past the Vikings 43-34 on...
headlines.shortLinkText: Rodgers at ease as Packers roll past Vikings 43-34

video.headline: Aaron Rodgers slings 4 TDs in win over Vikings

events.name: Miami Dolphins at New England Patriots

headlines.description: Cam Newton looked just fine as Tom Brady's replacement, rushing for two touchdowns Sunday, and the New England Patriots beat the Miami Dolphins 21-11 to open the season.
headlines.shortLinkText: Newton runs for 2 TDs, Patriots hold off Dolphins 21-11

video.headline: Cam rushes for two touchdowns in Patriots debut

headlines.description: The Washington Football Team played like a group of guys determined to make a name for themselves.
headlines.shortLinkText: Washington gets 8 sacks, rallies for 27-17 win over Eagles

events.name: Las Vegas Raiders at Carolina Panthers

headlines.description: Josh Jacobs ran for 93 yards and three touchdowns, Derek Carr threw for 239 yards and a score and the Las Vegas Raiders hung on to beat the Carolina Panthers 34-30 on Sunday to spoil Matt Rhule's coaching debut.
headlines.shortLinkText: Jacobs runs for 3 TDs as Raiders hold off Panthers 34-30

video.headline: Agholor hauls in beautiful pass from Carr for TD

headlines.description: Minshew Mania is back and maybe better than before.
headlines.shortLinkText: Minshew Mania 2.0: Jaguars stun Colts 27-20 in season opener

video.headline: Minshew tosses three TDs in win over Colts

headlines.description: Looking every bit like the reigning NFL MVP, Lamar Jackson threw for 275 yards and three touchdowns to help the Baltimore Ravens beat the Browns 38-6 Sunday, ruining Kevin Stefanski's debut as Cleveland's head coach in a game played without fans in...
headlines.shortLinkText: Jackson throws 3 TD passes for Ravens in 38-6 rout of Browns

events.name: Dallas Cowboys at Los Angeles Rams
Houston Texans at Kansas City Chiefs

headlines.description: Just about the only thing that looked familiar about the NFL's long-awaited return Thursday night was the sight of Patrick Mahomes effortlessly leading the Kansas City Chiefs up and down the field.
headlines.shortLinkText: Chiefs begin title defense with 34-20 victory over Texans
